title: The Salt marsh: a question of values
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Stanley Croner
brief_description: For the survival of humanity, we have to recognise the limits of our exploitation of natural systems. This film documents the value of the botanical communities that exist between sea and land. Emphasises the importance of energy flow and food supply in marshes and estuaries.
